description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nChanneling:
This creature can't {ACTION_cast} spells manually. Your creatures have 5% more {STAT_attack}, {STAT_intelligence}, {STAT_speed}, {STAT_defense}, or {STAT_health} for each permanent {CLASS_Chaos}, {CLASS_Sorcery}, {CLASS_Nature}, {CLASS_Death}, or {CLASS_Life} Spell Gem this creature has equipped. This trait does not stack.
name: Caustic Chain
